name: Clanbeat, Inc.
description: Developer of a talent development platform designed to facilitate students and adults in driving their own learning and being well-balanced human beings along that journey. The company's platform helps students build positive learning habits with regular reflection nudges, work planner, and goal-setting features and allow teachers to collect on students' mood and well-being from actionable insights and data, empowering students and teachers everywhere to take the lead in their life and learning.
one_liner: Developer of a talent development platform designed to facilitate students and adults in driving their own learning and being well-balanced human beings along that journey. The company's platform helps students build positive learning habits with regular reflection nudges, work planner, and goal-setting features and allow teachers to collect on students' mood and well-being from actionable insights and data, empowering students and teachers everywhere to take the lead in their life and learning.
